Title: Relates to requiring certain trains and locomotives to have a crew size of not less than two persons
Summary: Requires any Class I freight railroad, Class I railroad or Class II railroad for transporting freight which operates a train or locomotive in this state to have a crew size of not less than two persons.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the railroad law, in relation to requiring certain trains and locomotives to have a crew size of not less than two persons
